relation: Great for these types of students
It is perfect for someone who is looking for a not to big/not to small school. Tech is known for its engineering program, and now also the nursing program.
Tour the campus and talk to students!
I had looked at many other schools, and in my particular area I am in a higher rated department, paying way less than average.

The campus is beautiful and for the most part everyone is very friendly and inviting. There are many activities on campus, numerous clubs, and a great greek life program. As long as you bring a positive attitude, you will quickly assimilate into college life at Tech.

The general courses are wonderful and challenging. Speaking from experience TTU's classes are on par with any other college, if not more challenging than some more expensive, larger colleges. They offer just the right amount of personalization, because the classes are not tiny but also not all huge lectures.
pageTitle: Tennessee Technological University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {195664=The collegiate FFA is great. They have a concert every semester. Fall semester of 2012, Deirks Bentley came and we got two free tickets., 191919=Cafeteria is versatile... but that's not always good. The only good food places close on Friday at 5:30 and open on Monday mornings around 10. Starbucks is really quick., 320415=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 7206=I enjoy the small town feel of Tech. It's safe and cops are always patrolling so I don't have to be as nervous about walking over to the library at night. Also the campus is small so if I am running late for that 8 o'clock class I can get there in five minutes.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Tennessee Tech is one of the best business schools! Tennessee Tech has an enrollment of over 10,700 students and more than 50% of classes with 20 students or less! Tennessee Tech degrees give grads highest salary potential of all tennessee public universities! Therefore, you'll be working with a lot of amazing people! Bang for the buck It's probably one of the least expensive schools in the state, but you get so much out of it! Definitely the bang for the buck! Will enjoy being here There are so many kind and thoughtful people at Tennessee Tech! They have helped me tremendously throughout the application process, housing, etc! I loved the campus tour and learned so much! I know being at Tech will give me a life long successful career! Will learn a lot There are a lot of smart people here, and I haven't heard a negative thing yet about it! When I tell everybody I am going to Tech, they say, Wow! That's a great school! Everybody is so excited for me! Login to rate or flag the reviews
